series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXVI, 4494-4544. - I. New Testament (4494-4500). - II. Epigram and Elegy (4501-4507). - III. Comedy (4508-4523). - IV. Documentary Texts (4524-4544).
bibl.seg: GONIS N. and J. CHAPA, W.E.H. COCKLE, D. OBBINK, P.J. PARSONS, J.D. THOMAS, with contributions by J.L. CALVO MARTÍNEZ, T. FINNEY, E.W. HANDLEY, W.B. HENRY, D. MONTSERRAT, U. SCHLAG, P. SCHUBERT, A. SYRCOU, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXVI (Nos 4494-4544). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 86.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1999, 8°, xii-248 pp. et XX pll. ISBN 0-85698-140-0.
P. Oxy. LXVI, 4494-4544. - I. New Testament (4494-4500). - II. Epigram and Elegy (4501-4507). - III. Comedy (4508-4523). - IV. Documentary Texts (4524-4544).
C.R. par Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 76 (2001) Nos 151-152, pp. 300-304. - Wolfgang Luppe, Gnomon 74 (2002) pp. 485-490.
Gonis Chapa Cockle Obbink Parsons Thomas Calvo Martínez Finney Handley Henry Montserrat Schlag Schubert Syrcou
